title: SmartLink Resolution Result v1
description: Result of resolving a single click through SmartLink routing logic. Part of SmartLink MOVA 4.0.0 implementation.

smartlink_id.description: The smartlink identifier that was resolved.

resolved_target_id.description: The target_id that was selected by the routing logic.

outcome.description: Overall outcome of the resolution attempt.

reason.description: Short textual reason or code explaining the outcome.

matched_conditions.description: Summary of which conditions matched (for analytics and debugging).

latency_ms.description: Time taken to resolve the target in milliseconds.

executor_id.description: Identifier of the executor/worker that performed the resolution (optional).

debug_info.description: Optional debug information (only included when debug mode is enabled).
